I submitted a different [PR](https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/19754/), for something that I personally use in my code, it shows a major improvement for `io.WriteString`, I did a quick search and couldn't find anything against using unsafe in the stdlib.

```
benchmark                       old ns/op     new ns/op     delta
BenchmarkWriteStringLong-8      5219513       65.9          -100.00%  # long string is 44 * 1024 * 1024 bytes.
BenchmarkWriteStringShort-8     112           65.7          -41.34%   # short is 44 bytes.
```
